name: Constricted
description:
You have been kidnapped! Break free from the clutches of a madman!

But be weary, your choice of escape might entail unforeseen consequences!

Made in less than a day as my first game to challenge myself! Inspired by Lilly's Well.

CONTROLS: ARROW KEYS FOR MOVEMENT / Z KEY TO INTERACT

CONTROLLER: Automatically compatible with Xbox controllers. 

D-PAD FOR MOVEMENT / B TO INTERACT

Note: No music, so bring your own soundtrack of choice in tow.

Download Versions: The ROM can be extracted and played on a Gameboy or Gameboy Emulator. The POCKET version can be extracted and played on MicroSD or loaded onto GameBoy cartridge and played with an Analogue Pocket. 

I want to give special thanks and credit to the following: moshuo, Tiled, Parabellum Games and Jan Schneider for some of their assets utilized in this project.

As well as Pixel Pete and Robert Doman for their video tutorials.

And last but certainly not least GB Studio, for the awesome engine!

moshuo's GBStudio Sprite pack can be found here : https://moshuo.itch.io/gbstudio-sprites 

Tiled Map Editor can be found here: https://thorbjorn.itch.io/tiled 

GB Studio Character Pack can be found here: https://parabellum-games.itch.io/gb-s... 

Jan Schneider's Mansion Interior - Assets Pack can be found here: https://jan-schneider.itch.io/mansion...

Pixel Pete can be found here: Pixel Pete (Peter Milko) - YouTube

Robert Doman can be found here: Robert Doman - YouTube

GB Studio can be found here: GB Studio by Chris Maltby (itch.io)
